pizza.name: Margherita Pizza
pizza.description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

pizza.name: Pepperoni Pizza
pizza.description: Delicious pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and slices of spicy pepperoni.

pizza.name: Hawaiian Pizza
pizza.description: Savory pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, pineapple chunks, and a touch of oregano.

pizza.name: Supreme Pizza
pizza.description: Loaded pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, and black olives.

pizza.name: Mushroom and Truffle Pizza
pizza.description: Indulgent pizza featuring a blend of wild mushrooms, truffle oil, mozzarella cheese, and a sprinkle of Parmesan.

pizza.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
pizza.description: Tangy barbecue sauce base topped with diced chicken, red onions, mozzarella cheese, and cilantro.

pasta.name: Lobster Ravioli
pasta.description: Delicate ravioli stuffed with succulent lobster meat, served with a creamy tomato and brandy sauce.

pasta.name: Penne alla Vodka
pasta.description: Penne pasta tossed in a creamy vodka sauce made with tomatoes, heavy cream, and a touch of vodka.

pasta.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
pasta.description: Classic Italian dish featuring spaghetti pasta served with a rich and hearty meat sauce.

pasta.name: Seafood Linguine
pasta.description: Linguine pasta served with a medley of fresh seafood, including shrimp, mussels, and clams, in a garlic white wine sauce.

barbecue.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
barbecue.description: Tender pulled pork piled high on a soft bun, served with coleslaw and your choice of barbecue sauce.

barbecue.name: Beef Brisket
barbecue.description: Slow-smoked beef brisket rubbed with spices, sliced thin, and served with pickles and barbecue sauce.

barbecue.name: Grilled BBQ Corn
barbecue.description: Fresh corn on the cob grilled to perfection and coated with a savory barbecue glaze.

barbecue.name: BBQ Chicken Wings
barbecue.description: Crispy chicken wings coated in a smoky barbecue sauce, served with celery sticks and ranch dressing.

barbecue.name: Smoked Sausages
barbecue.description: Juicy smoked sausages served with grilled onions and peppers, and a side of tangy barbecue sauce.

fried foods.name: Chicken Nuggets
fried foods.description: Crispy and golden chicken nuggets served with various dipping sauces.

fried foods.name: Onion Rings
fried foods.description: Battered and deep-fried onion rings, a classic side dish or snack.

fried foods.name: Fried Calamari
fried foods.description: Tender calamari rings coated in a crispy batter and served with marinara sauce and lemon wedges.

fried foods.name: Fried Mozzarella Sticks
fried foods.description: Melted mozzarella cheese sticks coated in breadcrumbs and deep-fried until golden and gooey inside.

fried foods.name: Fries
fried foods.description: Dill pickle slices coated in a seasoned breading and fried until crispy, served with a tangy dipping sauce.

burgers.name: Classic Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and a special sauce, served in a bun.

burgers.name: Veggie Burger
burgers.description: Plant-based patty made from vegetables, grains, and legumes, served with fresh toppings and condiments.

burgers.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Juicy beef patty topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

burgers.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
burgers.description: Beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, lettuce, and creamy aioli.

burgers.name: Double Bacon BBQ Burger
burgers.description: Double beef patties, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, onion rings, and barbecue sauce.

burgers.name: Jalapeño Burger
burgers.description: Spicy burger topped with sliced jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, lettuce, and chipotle mayo.

burgers.name: Mexican Chicken burger
burgers.description: Mexican chicken burger topped with sliced caramelized onions, pico de gallo, cotija cheese, tortilla chips and a spicy lime and sour cream mayo
